title: Belgian Block: The Ideal Landscaping Accent for Coastal Homes
metaDescription: When it comes to coastal landscaping, certain challenges arise, primarily - the unpredictability of the elements. Island properties deal with a number of elements - the salty air, the wind, and nuisance flooding. The choices made in landscaping need to not only complement the natural beauty of the surroundings but also offer resilience to seasonal challenges. Enter the Belgian Block - a garden accent that blends aesthetics and function.
h1: Belgian Block: The Ideal Landscaping Accent for Coastal Homes

title: Trending Hardscape Designs in New Jersey’s Landscaping Scene
metaDescription: Sustainability in Avalon & Stone Harbor, NJ has become a key design principle. Hardscape designs for these high-end properties often feature eco-friendly materials such as recycled concrete and permeable pavers. These choices not only uphold environmental responsibility but also add a unique aesthetic appeal that complements the grandeur of these properties.
h1: Trending Hardscape Designs in New Jersey’s Landscaping Scene

title: Coastal Erosion & Flooding Control
metaDescription: Owning a home on the 7 Mile Island offers soothing ocean sounds, salty breezes, and year-round relaxation. But it also presents unique challenges including rising water during storms and potential coastal erosion for shorefront properties. At Blue Quality Lawn Care, we specialize in providing sustainable landscaping services, with custom designs and maintenance plans for all types of properties.

title: New Irrigation Regulations? Blue Quality Lawn Care Can Help
metaDescription: The Borough of Stone Harbor put in place new water restrictions for all property owners and residents for 2023 - specifically mentioning that the grass, trees, and landscape beds located between the curb and the sidewalk can only be watered by systems utilizing drip and/or trickle irrigation.
h1: New Irrigation Regulations? Blue Quality Lawn Care Can Help
